From DCIS to ILC- advice needed dobie iodine

Posts.Content: Oct 9, 2007 08:32PM moonie wrote: Hi! I had an ooph @ age 47 done lapro.  It was an easy (for me anyway--compared to all the other surgeries) outpatient surgery.  I had it done on a Wednesday and was back to work on Monday.  For me, it was a choice I made because I WANTED to take an AI as studies have shown them to reduce recurrence more than Tamoxifen.  It does push you into menopause and some people have more issues with that than others.   I just really wanted to get rid of most of that nasty estrogen running around in my body. But...it must be your decision. Good luck to you!
